Home.heroDescription: Discover meaningful connections and ignite your love story with intelligent matching and engaging experiences.
Home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to find your perfect match
Home.facialAnalysisMatchingDescription: Advanced AI analyzes compatibility through facial features and psychological insights.
Home.aiConversationCoachDescription: Get real-time coaching to improve your chat conversations and build deeper connections.
Home.speedDatingDescription: Join fast-paced virtual events based on shared interests and find instant chemistry.
Home.gameDescription: Break the ice with trivia, time challenges, and personality-revealing games.
Home.blindExchangeModeDescription: Connect without photos or profiles - discover personalities and chemistry first.
Home.geolocationMeetingDescription: Find and meet people at carefully curated public spaces in your area.
Home.chatDescription: Enhanced messaging with AI-powered suggestions and intention tagging.
Home.rewardsDescription: Earn badges, unlock premium features, and track your dating journey progress.
Home.whyChooseSubtitle: The smart way to find meaningful connections
Home.aiPoweredDesc: Our advanced algorithms understand compatibility beyond surface level
Home.safeSecureDesc: Privacy-first approach with content moderation and user verification
Home.meaningfulDesc: Focus on authentic relationships, not superficial swipes
Home.ctaDescription: Join thousands who've discovered meaningful relationships through HeartWise
Home.description: Find meaningful connections and build lasting relationships
Home.mainPageDescription: Discover all the features to make your meetings and exchanges easier.
Home.dinnersEventsDesc: Organize shared meals and invite your friends.
Home.recipesLibraryDesc: Explore recipes and share your ideas.
Home.smartPantryDesc: Manage your stocks and avoid waste.

About.heroDescription: We're revolutionizing how people connect through emotional intelligence and authentic relationships.
About.visionStatement: Our vision is to create a world where technology enhances human connection rather than replacing it, where every interaction is meaningful, and where finding love is an empowering journey of self-discovery.
About.aiMatchingDesc: Our AI doesn't just look at superficial compatibility - it understands psychological traits, communication styles, and emotional resonance.
About.emotionalIntelligenceDesc: We help you navigate conversations with empathy and understanding, building genuine connections that last.
About.realWorldMeetingsDesc: While we start online, we encourage and facilitate safe, real-world meetings in public spaces.
About.privacyFirstDesc: Your data is yours. We use advanced encryption and give you full control over what you share and when.
About.authenticConnectionsDesc: We prioritize genuine relationships over superficial matches.
About.respectConsentDesc: Every interaction is built on mutual respect and clear consent.
About.innovationDesc: We use technology to enhance human connection, not replace it.
About.missionStatement: To empower people to form meaningful, lasting relationships by combining cutting-edge AI with human emotional intelligence, creating a dating experience that honors both technology and humanity.

Features.title: All Features
Features.subtitle: Discover everything HeartWise has to offer
Features.dashboardDesc: Your personalized command center with insights, stats, and quick access to all features.
Features.facialAnalysisDesc: Revolutionary technology that suggests matches based on facial compatibility and psychological insights.
Features.aiCoachDesc: Real-time AI guidance to improve your messaging and build stronger connections.
Features.blindExchangeDesc: Connect through personality first - photos and profiles revealed as you chat and bond.
Features.riskyWordsDesc: AI helps you avoid misunderstandings by flagging potentially ambiguous messages.
Features.geolocationDesc: Meet people in safe, public spaces near you with location-based matching.
Features.speedDatingDesc: Fast-paced, interest-based sessions to meet multiple potential matches quickly.
Features.chatDesc: Smart chat with intention tagging, content moderation, and AI-suggested responses.
Features.gamesDesc: Break the ice with trivia, personality games, and fun challenges that reveal compatibility.
Features.rewardsDesc: Earn badges, accumulate points, and unlock premium features as you engage with the platform.
Features.profileDesc: Comprehensive profile tools with privacy controls and content moderation.
Features.ctaTitle: Ready to Experience the Future of Dating?
Features.ctaDescription: Join thousands who have already discovered more meaningful connections through our innovative platform.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.subtitle: Customize your HeartWise experience
Settings.notificationsDesc: Choose what notifications you'd like to receive
Settings.privacyDesc: Control who can see your information and how it's used
Settings.preferencesDesc: Customize the app to match your style
Settings.showLocationDesc: Allow others to see your approximate location for meetups
Settings.showOnlineStatusDesc: Let others know when you're active on HeartWise
Settings.facialAnalysisDesc: Allow AI to analyze your photos for better matching
Settings.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save important messages to your favorites
Settings.soundNotificationsDesc: Play sounds for new messages and notifications
Settings.settingsSavedDesc: Your preferences have been updated successfully

FeatureCards.blindExchangeModeDescription: Connect with someone new without seeing photos or profiles initially.
FeatureCards.gameDescription: Play fun games like Trivia and Time's Up to connect with others.
FeatureCards.speedDatingDescription: Join fast-paced, interest-based virtual speed dating sessions.
FeatureCards.chatDescription: Engage in real-time conversations with your matches.
FeatureCards.rewardsDescription: View your earned badges, points, and unlock premium features.
